2023.title: Microservices drive DevOps adoption
2023.description: Microservice architectures became foundational, enabling faster deployment, better scalability, and independent service development.

2023.title: AIOps emerges for anomaly detection
2023.description: AI/ML began powering DevOps pipelines to detect anomalies, predict infrastructure issues, and automatically remediate problems.

2023.title: DevSecOps gains momentum
2023.description: Security shifted left; integrating automated security checks and vulnerability scanning into CI/CD became standard practice.

2023.title: Cloud-native and Kubernetes growth
2023.description: Kubernetes and container orchestration became essential parts of DevOps toolchains, with widespread adoption across industries.

2023.title: Observability becomes critical
2023.description: Teams invested in observability platforms to monitor distributed systems, logs, and traces for faster incident response.

2023.title: CI/CD pipelines evolve
2023.description: Pipelines enhanced with more automation, including automated testing, canary deployments, and blue-green rollouts.

2023.title: Platform engineering rises
2023.description: Internal developer platforms emerged, simplifying self-service deployments and reducing friction between dev and ops teams.
